title: How to Clean a Showerhead
summary: Using vinegar to remove mineral deposits from a showerhead.
content: To clean a showerhead using vinegar, fill a plastic bag with white vinegar and secure it around the showerhead with a rubber band. Make sure the showerhead is fully submerged in the vinegar. Let it soak for at least an hour to dissolve mineral deposits. Afterward, remove the bag and run the shower to rinse out any remaining vinegar and debris.
